Events that occurred on 21 March

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1923 – Voice actor Peter Pratt is born.
1956 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to E. Rasdall.
1957 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 196.
1966 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to George Sayer.
1967 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Humphrey Carpenter.
1968 – Actor Greg Ellis is born.
1974 – Actor Joseph Mawle is born.
2007 – The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "The City of Kings" is released in North America.
2011 – Update 2: Echoes of the Dead, the second update of The Lord of the Rings Online, is released in North America.
2011 – Principal photography for The Hobbit (film series) begins.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 2510:
Borondir is on his way in search of the Éothéod.
T.A. 3017:
Aragorn delivers Gollum as a prisoner to Thranduil of Mirkwood.
T.A. 3019:
The Host of the West marches towards the Black Gate.
Frodo and Samwise continue their journey along the road to Barad-dûr.
New Moon[1]

content.title: References
content.content: ↑ Wayne G. Hammond and Christina Scull (eds), The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion, p. xlix
